llm_text:
Why:
The model flag is driven primarily by payment_format_ach (value=1; SHAP +2.76488), which most strongly increased the score, combined with a relatively large amount_paid (9099.08; SHAP +0.68426) and amount_received (9099.08; SHAP +0.67105) â€” both values increased the score and are identical. Additional contributors include from_bank (231212; SHAP +0.43306), dayofweek (5; SHAP +0.39696) and payment_currency_euro (value=1; SHAP +0.15656). Each of these features (named as shown) moved the model toward flagging this transaction.

Conclusion:
In sum, an ACH transfer (payment_format_ach=1) in euros (payment_currency_euro=1) for 9099.08 (paid and received equal) from from_bank=231212 on dayofweek=5 produced a higher model score. If one were to prioritize review, focusing on the ACH/euro amount equality and the sending bank (231212) would be most relevant.
